content: Recall #RC-2025-01: certain 2024 SUV frames may have weld defects. Free frame inspection and reinforcement offered.
metadata: Applies to VIN range: ABC1000-ABC1999, production date: May-Jun 2024

content: Extended warranty on EV battery packs for 8 years/100,000 miles. Covers manufacturing defects only.
metadata: Model: EV Crossover, code: EVC-333, contact for claims: EVWarranty@autoco.com

content: Towing package wiring harness may overheat on certain trucks. Service campaign includes free replacement harness.
metadata: Campaign code: TOW-2025, truck line: Plant #4

content: Hybrid brake booster recall: potential vacuum leak under extreme cold. Affects EcoSedan built before Jan 2025.
metadata: Recall code: HYB-BR-01, fix requires dealer reprogram + part swap

content: Diesel model extended warranty on emissions components up to 5 years/60,000 miles. Certain states only.
metadata: Applies to Work-truck trim, states: CA, NY, MA, WA
